name: Dark Star (Melbourne House)
overview: From the book "Commodore 64 Games Book". Test your skills against the enemy and the clock! The Death Star will obliterate your home planet, when it comes into range from behind its moon, using the immense power of its space gun. Before this happens you will attempt to take as many attacking enemy fighters with you before you are shot down or they shoot your home planet. You fly your X wing fighter along the trench on the Death Star engaging the enemy in mortal combat, using the ‘Z’ and ‘C’ keys to move left and right and M’ to fire. Straight Shooting!
